1644000.name: FAIRYMM: the Insomniac Beauty
1644000.description:
FAIRYMM: the Insomniac Beauty is a 1st Person View closed-door in which you play as Aurora, victim of multiple sleep disorders. Paralyzed in your bed, use your senses to face numerous threats coming to haunt you every night. Curiosity, deduction, reflexes, a cold-blooded mind and the quality of your observations will be the keys of your way out in this Survival Horror!



Live an immersive and stressful experience with innovating gameplay far from traditional ways to confront danger in classic horror games. Control your senses to handle your anxiety and inspect your surroundings to not fall into madness. With an evolving setting, in which every attempt will be different from the previous one, will you be brave enough to survive multiple anguish nights to unveil the mystery around the story?

Featuring 3 levels of difficulties and 10 different endings to unlock depending of your actions during those 10 terrible nights, enjoy consistent replay value. Which setting elements have you interacted with? Which secrets have you revealed to Aurora? Your actions will seal her fate... An intriguing and terrifying mission, with dark and hard topics, that shall not be taken by any hands.

Bringing a brand new perspective to the popular Sleeping Beauty tale, antipode of most sweetened modern adaptations, enter the FAIRYMM universe’s license that is already counting more than 8 projects ready to be developed after this one. All being in the same connected universe, all being horror games, all with different style and gameplay. A franchise filled with ambitions that have never been seen before!

Anyone loving fairy tales for their gruesome origins… this game was made for you!

Never fairy tales have been so scarily grim, mad and twisted.
1644000.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
